attributes.action: Unreservedly apologies for his "flat earth" comments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister must immediately and unreservedly apologies for his offensive comments regarding anyone who has a legitimate concern over the science behind climate change.  As his position as Prime Minister who should be encouraging reasoned debate and good research, not acting in a way to similar to an oppressive regime, ridiculing anyone who has a different opinion to his government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
